parts.text: {"word":"primitive","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"原始的な、原始社会の、未開の","english_definition":"relating to an early stage in the development of humans or animals.","examples":[{"sentence":"Primitive tools were made of stone.","translation":"原始的な道具は石で作られていた。"},{"sentence":"The tribe still lives in a primitive way.","translation":"その部族は今でも原始的な生活様式で暮らしている。"},{"sentence":"Primitive societies often have strong oral traditions.","translation":"原始社会はしばしば強い口承文化を持つ。"}],"collocations":["primitive culture (原始文化)","primitive tools (原始的な道具)","primitive society (原始社会)","primitive art (原始美術)","primitive instincts (原始的な本能)"],"synonyms":["early","ancient","rudimentary","undeveloped","unsophisticated"],"antonyms":["advanced","developed","sophisticated","modern"]},{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"単純な、未発達の、粗末な","english_definition":"simple or basic; not highly developed or sophisticated.","examples":[{"sentence":"The cabin was primitive, with no running water.","translation":"その小屋は粗末で、水道がなかった。"},{"sentence":"The computer graphics were quite primitive.","translation":"そのコンピュータグラフィックスはかなり粗末だった。"},{"sentence":"His understanding of the subject was rather primitive.","translation":"彼のその主題に対する理解はかなり未発達だった。"}],"collocations":["primitive conditions (粗末な環境)","primitive technology (未発達な技術)","primitive design (単純な設計)","primitive understanding (未発達な理解)"],"synonyms":["basic","simple","crude","rudimentary","unsophisticated","underdeveloped"],"antonyms":["complex","sophisticated","advanced","elaborate"]},{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"初期の、根本的な、根源的な","english_definition":"relating to the earliest stage of something; fundamental or essential.","examples":[{"sentence":"The primitive church was very different from the modern church.","translation":"初期の教会は現代の教会とは大きく異なっていた。"},{"sentence":"These are the primitive elements of the story.","translation":"これらは物語の根本的な要素である。"},{"sentence":"The primitive meaning of the word has been lost over time.","translation":"その言葉の根源的な意味は時とともに失われてしまった。"}],"collocations":["primitive church (初期教会)","primitive elements (根本的な要素)","primitive meaning (根源的な意味)","primitive form (初期形態)"],"synonyms":["original","initial","fundamental","essential","primary","elemental"],"antonyms":["derivative","secondary","advanced"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"原始的な人、未開人","english_definition":"a person belonging to an early stage of civilization.","examples":[{"sentence":"Anthropologists study primitives to understand human origins.","translation":"人類学者は人類の起源を理解するために原始的な人々を研究する。"}],"collocations":["study primitives (原始的な人々を研究する)"],"synonyms":["aborigine","native","tribesman","early human"],"antonyms":["civilized person","modern human"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「primitivus」（最初の、初期の）に由来し、「primus」（最初の）から派生。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈprɪmɪtɪv/","syllables":"prim-i-tive"},"inflection":{"notes":"形容詞なので、比較級・最上級の変化があります (more primitive, most primitive)。名詞の複数形は primitives。"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**primitive**」は、主に「原始的な」「未開の」という意味で使われます。これは、社会、文化、技術などが発達していない初期の段階を指します。また、「単純な」「粗末な」という意味もあり、洗練されていない、基本的な状態を表す場合にも用いられます。さらに、「初期の」「根本的な」という意味で、物事の起源や本質に関わることを示すこともあります。人に対して使う場合は、現代社会の価値観から見て未発達な文化を持つ人々を指すことがありますが、この用法は慎重に扱う必要があります。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ The primitive of the function.","correct":"✓ The derivative of the function.","note":"数学における「原始関数」は、英語では "primitive function" ではなく "antiderivative" または "indefinite integral" と言います。"},{},{"incorrect":"✗ He has a primitive house with all the latest gadgets.","correct":"✓ He has a simple house with all the latest gadgets.","note":"「原始的な家」と「最新のガジェット」という組み合わせは矛盾しています。家が「原始的」であるならば、最新のガジェットがある可能性は低いでしょう。ここでは「simple (簡素な)」という言葉を使う方が適切です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["primitively (副詞: 原始的に)","primitiveness (名詞: 原始性)","primitivism (名詞: 原始主義)"],"idioms_phrases":[],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"中頻度 (Moderate frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「**primitive**」は、初期段階や未発達な状態を表す言葉です。例えば、原始的な道具や社会、単純な技術などを指すときに使われます。また、初期の教会や根本的な要素など、物事の起源や本質に関わる意味合いもあります。現代社会の価値観から見て未発達な文化を持つ人々を指す場合もありますが、この用法は注意が必要です。文脈によって意味が異なるため、注意して使いましょう。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The **primitive** cave paintings offer a glimpse into the lives of early humans.","translation":"原始的な洞窟壁画は、初期の人類の生活を垣間見せてくれる。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"原始的な"},{"sentence":"The **primitive** technology made farming very difficult.","translation":"未発達な技術のせいで、農業は非常に困難だった。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"単純な・粗末な"},{"sentence":"The **primitive** church focused on community and simple living.","translation":"初期の教会は共同体と簡素な生活に焦点を当てていた。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"初期の"},{"sentence":"The artist was inspired by **primitive** art forms.","translation":"その芸術家は原始美術の形式に触発された。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"原始的な"},{"sentence":"The software had a very **primitive** user interface.","translation":"そのソフトウェアは非常に粗末なユーザーインターフェースを持っていた。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"単純な・粗末な"}]}
